summary.para: Retrieves an enumerator for traversing the blocks of a file listed in the block map.

param.name: blocks
param.para: The enumerator for traversing the blocks.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the size of the zip local file header of the associated zip file item.

param.name: lfhSize
param.para: In a valid app package, lfhSize corresponds to the size of the zip local file header of the associated zip file item.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves the name of the associated zip file item.

param.name: name
param.para: In a valid app package, name corresponds to the name of the associated zip file item.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The caller is responsible for deallocating the memory used for name. Use the function to deallocate the memory.

summary.para: Retrieves the uncompressed size of the associated zip file item.

param.name: size
param.para: In a valid app package, size is the uncompressed size of the associated zip file item.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Validates the content of a file against the hashes stored in the block elements for this block map file.

param.name: fileStream
param.para: The stream that contains the file's contents. The stream must support , , and . If these methods fail, their error codes might be passed to and returned by this method.

param.name: isValid
param.para: TRUE if the file hash validates; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBlockMapFile

summary.para: Represents a file in the block map.

remarks.para: The IAppxBlockMapFile interface provides a read-only object model that represents the files in the block map. Files are represented in the block map file with the File element. You can retrieve the file's attributes and block hashes from the File element. Block hashes can be obtained from the interface.
For a code example, see the Query app package and app manifest sample.

member.seealso: Query app package and app manifest sample
